content.rendered:
We know you may be missing Socialising, Networking, or basically, just any form of human contact! The world of events has been completely turned upside down, with every event either becoming a Drive-Through or of course, through Zoom, MS Teams, Skype, the list goes on! Although it’s not the same, virtual events are still a great way of keeping connected and they offer you a form of escapism. For today’s post, we thought we would write up a little round up of all the virtual events taking place in January 2021!

The Learning Zone

Of course we had to start with a great event that Regent College London are holding. Created by The School of Computing & AI, the Learning Zone will feature monthly Guest Speaker events. We will be hosting guests from various industries to explore more about their life experiences, tips and tricks alongside a Q+A Session whereby attendees can ask to find out more! The sessions will take place at the end of each month, and we will be kicking off with our very first event on Friday 29th January 2021, from 5:00pm-6:00pm!

The first event features Tara McBride, whom has many years of experience within the IT Industry. Tara was previously the Head of Computing at a London University and is currently an IT Manager. Simply click this link to join: https://bit.ly/3oG6Gnf

The Big Fat Quiz of 2020

Based on the TV programme, Big Fat Quiz of the Year 2020, this is a great interactive and competitive quiz to help you and your friends test your knowledge of 2020. The Big Fat Quiz of the Year uses the latest in broadcasting, virtual events, and design software to take you through 10 rounds of highly-interactive gameplay with video, audio, special guests, graphics, news presents, and live triggers. There are a range of rounds featuring History, Music, Geography, and much more. You can sign up and find out information in full here.

Online Multiplayer Escape Room

Many are fans of escape rooms and miss the mystery and excitement of completing them in person. But we have found your perfect Escape Room fix, the virtual Escape Room is just as fun and tense! n this online escape room game, you’ll pilot an experimental robot called B.R.U.C.E. through 50–120 minutes of mind-boggling challenges. Drag, drop, solve and sleuth your way through each interactive puzzle, with every action synced across your team. Play with friends, family or even solo. Just assemble your team via your favourite communication platform (Zoom, Skype, etc.) and solve your way to victory! Find out more here.

The 2021 Financial Checklist

Bringing it down to some seriousness, finances are incredibly important and the next event might just help you. In this finance-forward, resolution-oriented workshop, Chelsea will pair with Lauren Anastasio, CFP® Financial Planner at SoFi, to run through the comprehensive checklist everyone needs to start their year off on a good note and finish strong, from budgeting to investing to income diversification. Find out all about the event here.

Monthly Wellness Wednesday: An Hour for You & Your Wellbeing

2020 taught us a lot about everything, but more so that it is incredibly important to look after yourself both mentally and physically. This is such a great event to help give yourself time to focus on you; an hour devoted to learning about different components of Wellness. Share this with your colleagues and clients! Each month will focus on a different aspect of wellness, i.e. Physical Health, Spirituality, Social Health, Emotional Wellbeing, etc. Click here to find out more.

Please note: Some of the mentioned events take place on different time zones, so please do check
the timings accordingly.
